Indoor // Autonomous // Drones

Product

As of today, all autonomous drone navigation is done via GPS signal. However, indoor these sensors can not be relied upon, closing off the opprotunity to plan drone paths indoors. Our unique relative location positioning system instead uses onboard readings from the accelerometer and gyroscope to quickly and accurately triangulate position.
Our platform can be installed on any off the shelf commercial drone running on ardupilot. Control path planning via a user friendly web application. State of the art safety features ensure that your drone will never crash again.
With RFID sensing power, Sparrow can detect any anomalies in your environment, rendering the area covered more safe and secure.
